correct reference: Forcibly impose opinions on the public.
reason: The term 强奸 is used metaphorically to describe the act of forcefully imposing ones will on others without their consent. The phrase is often used to criticize politicians or leaders who ignore the will of the people and act against their interests. Therefore, the translation violate public opinion is more accurate and appropriate in this context.
